mapper.update: UPDATE jobPost SET title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, experience = #{experience, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, homepage = #{homepage, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE jobPost_id = #{jobPostId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
